case.title: WLTM a virgin girl - any age/race - 23 (London)
case.text:
Hi
Well I have not been around the block much, have mostly been in relationships. But I want to try something a bit wilder. I have never been with a virgin girl, and part of me would find that exciting. I do not mind if you live in or out of London
As you can see from my pic i'm nothing special looking, but I do have a decent figure. In bed I will be gentle and unselfish, making sure you enjoy it too.
Please ask for more details, and tell me if you want something regular with someone you can trust, or just a one timer
